(D, T, S) = map(int, input().split())

if D / S <= T:
    print('Yes')
else:
    print('No')
# -*- coding: utf-8 -*-

d, t, s = map(int, input().split())  # 入力
print('Yes' if d <= t * s else 'No')  # 出力
# -*- coding: utf-8 -*-
d, t, s = map(int, input().split())

print('Yes' if d <= t * s else 'No')

# -*- coding: utf-8 -*-

d, t, s = map(int, input().split())
print('Yes' if d <= t*s else 'No')
# -*- coding: utf-8 -*-

a, b = map(int, input().split())
print(a + b)

(D, T, S) = map(int, input().split())

if D / S <= T:
    print('Yes')
else:
    print('No')

d, t, s = map(int, input().split())

if d/s <= t:
    print('Yes')
else:
    print('No')
